channel.title: Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket ' /var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock'
channel.description: Yeah.... Lock this. Thanks for looking and not posting, haha I know it was hard though, been 6 days and i finally fixed this problem!

[quote=“Server-Unknown.Net, post:5, topic:253676”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=335133.msg2618703#msg2618703 date=1231208128]
Probably a configuration problem if it was serverside.
[/quote]

Yes[/quote]I forget what my problem was, but I was trying to setup my VPS

item.title: Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket ' /var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock'
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

curious about three things… i know you fixed

  1. was it wrong port
  2. was it a firewall.
  3. was it some other type of program.

For some stupid ass reason, installation of nod32 disabled localhost via hosts file, i took that out and it still didnt let me localhost… so i uninstalled the motherfucker

Read full topic
